body:
Table: Armor Class Modifiers
Defender is…MeleeRanged
Behind cover+4+4
Blinded–21–21
Concealed or invisibleSee Concealment
Cowering–21–21
Entangled+02+02
Flat-footed+01+01
Grappling (but attacker is not)+0+0
Helpless–43+03
Kneeling or sitting–2+2
Pinned–43+03
Prone–4+4
Squeezing through a space–4–4
Stunned–21–21
1 The defender loses any Dexterity bonus to AC.
2 An entangled character takes a –4 penalty to Dexterity.
3 The defender is denied his Dexterity bonus to his Armor Class.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Modifiers/Table Armor Class Modifiers
name: Table: Armor Class Modifiers
